About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself

BIO

I am currently completing my bachelors in VIT Vellore. I am a Data Scientist, Frontend Web developer, Researcher ,& an Entrepreneur. I enjoy solving problems, and love algorithms. You can connect with me on:

Data Science

Deep Learning, Machine Learning

I am an active follower on the trends in deep learning and machine learning. I am an active member of the Stanford Scholar Initiative. I have implemented many deep learning algorithms.

Researcher

In deep learning

I am a Researcher in deep learning and have a couple of papers in the process of publishing. I have researched on various networks for semantic segmentation and have implemented the same.

Web Developer

Front End Web Developer, Back End Developer

I am comfortable with various languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Three.js, Saas. I know to use backend technologies like Php and Flask.
